column1: #Text=" Mako says : " Come on , what 's wrong ?
#Text=" Korra says : " How am I suppose to save this city when I ca n't even learn airbending ?
#Text=Aang had n't mastered all the elements when he was battling the Fire Nation .
#Text=" Bolin says : " And he was n't alone .
#Text=He had his friends to help him .
#Text=Look , the arena might be shut down but we 're still a team .
#Text=" Mako says : " We got your back Korra , and we can save this city .
#Text=" Korra says : " Yeah , let 's do it !
#Text=" Meelo says : " Yeah , let 's do it !
